entry.title: Julien added 'The Accidental Woman'
entry.content: ğŸ“š â€œThe Accidental Womanâ€ by Jonathan Coe â­ï¸ Rated: 4/5 ğŸ“ "Jonathan Coeâ€™s first published novel already shows clear signs of his trademark quirkiness. The intrusive narrator is genuinely delightful, adding a playful layer to what is already a swift and engaging read. That said, there is sometimes a sense of abruptness at the end of chapters, as if the rhythm stumbles just before moving on. Even so, it remains a tremendously good book, revealing just how talented Coe was from the very beginning, and how he would continue refining his craft with each subs..." ğŸ·ï¸ #JonathanCoe
